official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on certain glass articles.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on planar optical glass waveguide couplers produced by thallium doping utilizing ion exchange.

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on certain glass articles.
